text: Pinoy Idol is a popular TV show in the Philippines that lets anyone sing to people watching the show on television while they are being judged. The singers can be anyone between the age of 16 and 29 years. The show is now current programming in GMA Network. ==Host and judges== Pinoy Idol has three judges, who give comments on performances. The three judges are: * Ogie Alcasid * Jolina Magdangal * Wyngard Tracy Pinoy Idol also has a host, Raymond Gutierrez. Category:Reality television series
title: Pinoy Idol
